alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:28PM MST until August 23 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 328 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Superstition Mountains to 7 miles north of Queen Valley to near Superior, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, Superior, Gold Canyon, Top Of The World, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Top-Of-The-World, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains and Kings Ranch. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 194 and 235. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 24 and 28. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 147 and 150. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
